plot: People Watching follows a couple who pass the time watching other people. Whilst watching a couple argue they make up situations they are arguing about. Subconsciously however the situations soon reflect problems in their own relationship.
title: People Watching
plot_es: People Watching follows a couple who pass the time watching other people. Whilst watching a couple argue they make up situations they are arguing about. Subconsciously however the situations soon reflect problems in their own relationship.
plot_en: People Watching follows a couple who pass the time watching other people. Whilst watching a couple argue they make up situations they are arguing about. Subconsciously however the situations soon reflect problems in their own relationship.
